text: From the OSF preregistration: "If you plan on transforming, centering, recoding the data, or requiring a coding scheme for categorical variables, please describe that process.". Given that 80% of the time of a typical non-trivial machine learning workflow is spent on data wrangling (and not tuning models), I wonder how OSF is planning that people answer this question. Maybe, an answer could look like "See line 100-840 of src/cleaning.jl and line 600-1010 of src/aggregation.jl".

text: Maybe it's a good thing to be forced to explain 700 lines of data cleaning :slightly_smiling_face:

text: Fair enough. Maybe it should be interpreted as "try to be as complete as reasonably possible".

text: From my understanding of preregistration "we will run this script to do the data preparation" and linking to the script is the ideal statement of a data preparation process.
